MS MCQs

    Discover how to foster an AI-ready culture in customer service - Knowledge Check

    »

    1. When the Microsoft customer service team started their AI adoption journey, which AI capability did they identify for implementation?

      Equip agents with predictions and recommendations.

      Provide on-demand training for agents on support calls.

      Develop a chatbot to remote-access customer systems.

      Provide an interactive FAQ using Vision capability.


    2. What was one of the primary goals of the AI technology project for the Microsoft customer service team?

      Reduce the need to contract foreign support agents.

      Turn customer service into a profit center.

      Improve customer satisfaction and retention.

      Prove that AI technology can replace human customer service agents.


    3. When the Microsoft customer service team implemented AI in their business processes and work, what did the team do to empower employees with AI technology?

      Created a guided support tool called, “The Daily Reminder.”

      Provided a virtual agent to help the human agents prepare for support calls.

      Provided incentives to agents who actively use AI tools.

      Implemented machine-learning to respond to customer queries.


    4. When the Microsoft customer service team implemented AI technology into their operations, they used machine-learning tools to analyze which types of data?

      Frequently asked questions.

      Customer purchases.

      Diagnostic log data.

      Customer feedback.
